snippet: The intensity level could hit an all-time high when the rugged Seattle Seahawks and San Francisco 49ers, who form one of the National Football League's fiercest rivalries, meet on Sunday for a spot in the Super Bowl....

headline.print_headline: Fierce 49ers-Seahawks Rivals Clash for Super Bowl Berth
headline.main: Fierce 49ers-Seahawks Rivals Clash for Super Bowl Berth

lead_paragraph: The intensity level could hit an all-time high when the rugged Seattle Seahawks and San Francisco 49ers, who form one of the National Football League's fiercest rivalries, meet on Sunday for a spot in the Super Bowl.
